_a_pirates_treasure_map_description: Study a map to unearth two hidden treasure chests buried on a small island.
_a_captains_treasure_map_description: Study a map to unearth three hidden treasure chests buried on a large island.
_an_ashen_pirates_treasure_map_descripti: Study a map to unearth two hidden treasure chests buried on a small island in the perilous Devil's Roar.
_an_ashen_captains_treasure_map_descript: Study a map to unearth three hidden treasure chests buried on a large island in the perilous Devil's Roar.
_a_pirates_riddle_quest_description: Solve a short riddle to uncover modest riches hidden on a large island.
_a_captains_riddle_quest_description: Solve a long riddle to uncover plentiful riches hidden on a large island.
_an_ashen_pirates_riddle_quest_descripti: Solve a short riddle to uncover modest riches hidden on a large island in the perilous Devil's Roar.
_an_ashen_captains_riddle_quest_descript: Solve a long riddle to uncover plentiful riches hidden on a large island in the perilous Devil's Roar.
_a_pirates_treasure_vault_description: Recover three pieces of a lost treasure map, then unearth a key to an ancient vault of tricks and treasure.
_a_captains_treasure_vault_description: Recover six pieces of a lost treasure map, then unearth a key to an ancient vault of tricks and treasure.
_an_ashen_pirates_treasure_vault_descrip: Recover three pieces of a lost treasure map in the Devil's Roar, then unearth a key to an ancient vault of tricks and treasure.
_an_ashen_captains_treasure_vault_descri: Recover six pieces of a lost treasure map in the Devil's Roar, then unearth a key to an ancient vault of tricks and treasure.
